Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class RubberBall

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.Ball
project.chenlin_17.Views.RubberBall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
class RubberBall extends Ball
This class contains the model for the geometric ball and extends the ball class.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN
Note
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.

  • Constructor Details

    • RubberBall

      public RubberBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor initializes the ball view.
      It sets the basic value for the ball setting variable by calling its parent class.
      Parameters:
      center - ball's start position
      color - player set ball color
      group - ball's belonging world setting group
      Deleted:
      public Ball1(Point2D center,int radiusA,int radiusB,Color inner,Color border){}
      Note
      add ball face into scene group and let it shown

  • Method Details

    • makeBall

      protected javafx.scene.shape.Shape makeBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, int radiusA, int radiusB)
      This function inherits its parent class and returns the new ball view of an Ellipse.
      Specified by:
      makeBall in class Ball
      Parameters:
      center - expected center position
      radiusA - expected radius x
      radiusB - expected radius y
      Returns:
      Ball built with defined radius and center
      Note
      Double conversion is not needed in the javaFX API
